meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Judith Seeger Lewis Grossman Suzee Vlk Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #714.

td.p: Judith Seeger, an associate research engineer from Mountain View, California
Lewis Grossman, a law student from Westport, Connecticut
Suzee Vlk, a writer from San Diego, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $2,600)

tr.td: STATE CAPITALS
STAINED GLASS
ROCK 'N' ROLL TRIVIA
NAME CHANGES
BOTANY
"PO" POURRI

tr.td: Suzee!
Lewis
Judith
HISTORY
BROADCASTING
THE HUSBAND MARRIED
(Alex: We give you the names of the wives & you have to i.d. the husband.)
PSYCHOLOGY
ABBREVIATIONS
POE-POURRI

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_6_5', 'clue_DJ_6_5_stuck', '(Lewis: What is [*]?)
[Alex mistakenly named the third work as, "The Mystery in the Rue Morgue" and corrected it before revealing the Final Jeopardy! clue.]

(1 of) "The Purloined Letter"[*], "The Mystery of Marie Rogêt" or "The Murders in the Rue Morgue"

Lewis
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Suzee!
Lewis
Judith

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
Suzee!What is the Phillipines?
$0
LewisWhat is Burma?
$5,000
JudithWhat is Burma?
$200
Thailand')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Country in which you\'d have to be to build a bridge on the River Kwai')

tr.td: BODIES OF WATER
Country in which you'd have to be to build a bridge on the River Kwai
Suzee!
Lewis
Judith
3rd place: Jules Jurgensen his & hers watches + computerized version or Jeopardy! box game
2nd place: trip on Continental to Puerto Vallarta & stay at Plaza Vallarta Tennis & Beach Resort + computerized version or Jeopardy! box game
New champion: $7,500
Suzee!
Lewis
Judith

17 R,
5 W
(including 2 DDs)

20 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W
